sections.title: Admission
sections.text: Admitted with shortness of breath, CHF exacerbation.

sections.title: Hospital Course
sections.text: Responded well to IV diuretics. Improved oxygenation.

sections.title: Diagnostics
sections.text: Chest X-ray showed pulmonary edema. BNP elevated.

sections.title: Discharge Medications
sections.text: Lasix 40mg PO daily, Lisinopril 10mg PO daily.
